name: Super Army Shooting
description:
The terrorists attacked and occupied the city, and the people were forced to leave their homes. The terrorists in the city are planning the next terrorist activity. You are an elite commando striker, you accept a difficult mission. To destroy all the terrorists and restore the peace of the city.

Terrorists have their own armed, so the army provides you with more powerful weapons and equipment, so that you can better complete your mission. Protect yourself, and use your excellent combat capability to destroy terrorists, recapture the city, complete the mission.

Features:
- Real 3D environment
- Challenging missions
- realistic shooting sound effects
- High quality music
- a variety of powerful weapons
- Smart AI, make the game more interesting
- play anytime, anywhere
